briefdescription.para: Complete C ABI implementation for duvc-ctl library.

detaileddescription.para: This file implements the comprehensive C ABI interface, providing a stable C-compatible API that bridges to the underlying C++ implementation. All C++ exceptions are caught and converted to appropriate C error codes. Memory management is handled appropriately for C consumers.
